description: Fixed SST ERF simulation. Use pre-industrial climatological average SST and sea-ice distributions. Apply pre-industrial concentrations of WMGHG (well mixed greenhouse gases), pre-industrial emissions of aersols and aerosol precursors, present day (2014) emissions of CO/VOC, all other emissions of tropospheric ozone precursors set to pre-industrial levels. This is a timeslice experiment of 30 years total.
keywords: AerChemMIP, Tier 3, piControl perturbation, 1850 SST, 1850 WMGHG, 2014 VOC
long_name: pre-industrial climatolgical SSTs and forcing, but with 2014 VOC emissions
rationale: To compute the ERF for 1850 and 2014.

requirements.description: Idealised temporal constraint, repeating 1850 for 30 years
requirements.label: 1850-1851 30yrs

requirements.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) non-chemically reactive Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas (WMGHG) concentrations.  No methane, nitrous oxide or halocarbons.
requirements.keywords: Pre-industrial, 1850, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG, non-chemically reactive
requirements.label: 1850 Non-Reactive WMGHG Concentrations

requirements.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) emissions of aersol precursors.
requirements.label: 1850 Aerosol Precursor Emissions

requirements.description: Impose 2014 concentrations of carbon monoxide and volatile organic compounds (CO/VOC).
requirements.keywords: 2014, CO, carbon monoxide, VOC, volatile organic compounds, emissions
requirements.label: 2014 CO VOC Emissions

requirements.canonical_name: 1850 non-CO VOC Tropospheric Ozone Precursor Emissions
requirements.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) emissions of non-CO/VOC (Carbon Monoxide / Volatile Organic Compound) tropospheric ozone precursors.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial, 1850, non-CO/VOC tropospheric ozone precursor, emissions
requirements.label: 1850 non-CO VOC Tropospheric Ozone Precursor Emissions

requirements.description: Impose pre-industrial (1850) concentrations of Ozone depleating Halocarbons (CFC/HCFC).
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial, 1850, halocarbons, ODS, ozone depleting substances, CFCs, HCFCs
requirements.label: 1850 Ozone Depleting Halocarbon Concentrations

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea surface temperature from the piControl experiment
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SST, sea surface temperature
requirements.label: PIControlSST

requirements.description: Pre-Industrial sea ice concentration from the piControl experiment.
requirements.keywords: pre-industrial control, SIC, sea ice, sea ice concentration
requirements.label: PIControl SIC

requirements.description: Use an Atmosphere model with chemistry
requirements.label: AGCM-Chem Configuration
